General.Name: Gifore Agricultural Machinery Chain Co Ltd
General.Description: Gifore Agricultural Science & Technology Service Co.,Ltd offers agricultural machinery in China. The company provides traditional agricultural, fruit and vegetable, orchard, and animal husbandry and livestock farm machineries. It also offers smart agricultural solutions. The company was formerly known as Gifore Agricultural Machinery Chain Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Gifore Agricultural Science & Technology Service Co.,Ltd in September 2018. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.
General.Address: No.219, Gangtong North 2nd Road, Chengdu, China, 611743
